content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Now, let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for the most affordable option. I would say 300 euros per month would be a reasonable price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros is far below my expectations. The location of this apartment is prime, and the amenities are top-notch. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality of the property. How about 500 euros per month? That's a fair offer, considering the market value of similar apartments in the area. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 500 euros is still too high for me as a student. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month. I am smart and dependable, and I will take good care of the apartment. I am also responsible and will not cause any problems for you as the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While your offer is more in line with what I had in mind, I'm still not convinced it reflects the true value of the apartment. The property is brand new, in the heart of the city, and comes with all the modern conveniences. A tenant like you, who values affordability and is willing to maintain the property well, is exactly who I'm looking for. However, I need a price that reflects the investment I've made in this property. Let's meet in the middle. How about 450 euros per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I agree that 450 euros per month is a fair price for the apartment. However, as a student, I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay 440 euros per month, and I will ensure that the apartment is kept in good condition. I will also make sure that the rent is paid on time, every time.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your commitment to maintaining the property and paying the rent punctually is reassuring. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to negotiate. Since you're a student and I understand the financial constraints, I'm willing to make you an offer. How about we settle at 445 euros per month? This is a one-time concession for a tenant with your promise to respect the property and adhere to the lease terms. Does this sound agreeable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your generosity, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate it. I agree to the price of 445 euros per month. I will sign the lease and pay the deposit as soon as we agree on the move-in date. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we've reached an agreement. The move-in date is flexible, and we can discuss that in more detail when you sign the lease. I'll prepare all the necessary paperwork for you to sign. Thank you for choosing my apartment. I'm confident you'll be a great tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
